statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({5.76}+{4.95}\right)}={21.42}\approx{21.42}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{4.95}\cdot{5.61}={27.7695}\approx{27.8}.
